text: HRv 7ry TTHTif sifetaorut TM9 _ IPhone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (e& 4Raet 3k_{rtHTf AAltT4) 474 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vift-5 Qa 6, Taer-10, ERa, # ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Waiver of Damages for Delay/2019 +K No. 9.2.29/2019 Dated the 05 November, 2019 [Decision taken on File No. NHAICMD/2O19/HAM/Damages FC in reference to decision of the Authority against Agenda Item no. 131.06, 141.06 and 142.01] Sub: Hybrid Annuity Model (HAM) Projects Waiver of damages to the Concessionaires for  delay in submission of the Performance Security BG or achieving the Financial Close for the cases where the Authority was not in a position to hand over RoW The Authority vide its 131st  meeting dated 20.11.2018 (Agenda item no_ 131.06) , 141st meeting dated 30.07.2019 (Agenda item no_ 141.06) and  142nd meeting dated 19.09.2019 (Agenda item no. 142.01) has decided that if the Authority was not in a position to handover RoW, no penalty should be imposed for delays in submission of the performance security BG or achieving the Financial Close_ 2 This is issued with the approval of the Competent Authority. 0 $ Sharma_ CGM (Coord.) to: [ All Officers & Employees of HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices.
